rules_text:
When Cybernetic Scalper enters, target player exiles the top two cards of their library.
Retreat 3 {1}{W}{W} [i](Exile this permanent face-down. Distribute up to three +1/+1 counters among up to three target creatures you control.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Deathtouch
Other Clerics you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more cards you own are put into exile from anywhere, create a 1/1 white and black Cleric creature token.
